layouts_boxes.layouts_boxes_content:
SuperAdmin Utility
  • ">Force Update Client Patches - Update now to next client patch
  • ">Force Update Client - Update now to next client version
  • ">Force Update DB - Update database structure

Pay attention, make a backup before forcing an update.
